item.title: Unit Testing
item.description: Summary Making sure software works as expected and required is a crucial part of development. Doing this manually is tedious and error prone. In this lecture, you will learn the basics of automated unit testing for python using pytest. Slides as PDF This browser does not support PDFs. Please download the PDF to view it: Download PDF. item.title: Version Control using Git
item.description: Summary Version Control is an essential part of software development and modern science. This lecture gives an introduction to the concept of version control, to git and on how to collaborate on software or other projects using git. Slides as PDF This browser does not support PDFs.
